Watson-Form
===========

Make working with HTML forms more tolerable.

For full documentation please see `Read The
Docs <http://watson-form.readthedocs.org/>`__.

Build Status
^^^^^^^^^^^^

|Build Status| |Coverage Status| |Version|

Installation
------------

``pip install watson-form``

Dependencies
------------

-  watson-common
-  watson-html
-  watson-validators
-  watson-filters

Optional
~~~~~~~~

-  watson-http
